Frequently Asked Questions

Quick answers to common questions about our auditing services

How quickly can you complete our audit?

Our standard turnaround time is 7-14 business days. We also offer express services for urgent requirements, which can be completed within 5-7 business days.

Do you service all Australian states?

Yes, we provide trust account auditing services across all Australian states and territories. Our team is familiar with the specific requirements for each jurisdiction.

What information do you need to get started?

We'll need your trust account statements, transaction records, and reconciliation documents for the audit period. We'll provide a comprehensive checklist once you engage our services.
